messages.subject: Fw: this thread
messages.msgSnippet: Hi All, I am withdrawing from this Christian thread. I fail to see how this will benefit Brianna & me in any way. I was raised Catholic, lived in a Catholic
messages.messageBody:
Hi All,
I am withdrawing from this Christian thread. I fail to see how this will benefit Brianna & me in any way. I was raised Catholic, lived in a Catholic home, in a Catholic neighborhood, attended Catholic school; entered a convent. I later left the convent. Later, I rec'd my degree in history; I took many classes on religion; anthropology of religion, etc. I am now a pagan. A tree hugging, dirt worshipping, daughter of the Goddess. This works for us.
BTW - thanks for the urls.

Peace,
Janis

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
